models.householdMembers: The Zink family - 5 members with Aaron and Katie as admins
models.messages: Sample chat conversation between a user and Zylo (7-day rolling history)
models.mealSuggestions: Example meal options Zylo might suggest, tiered by effort

relationships: Chat messages are per-user (each family member has their own conversation)

messages.content: Happy to help! What proteins do you have thawed or ready to go?
Chicken thighs and some ground turkey
Nice options! Any veggies that need to be used up soon?
Bell peppers and some spinach that's getting sad
Perfect timing on that spinach. Energy level tonight - easy, medium, or feeling ambitious?
Got it. Here are 3 options that'll rescue that spinach:

mealSuggestions.name: One-Pan Chicken & Peppers
mealSuggestions.briefInstructions: Season chicken, toss peppers in oil, roast together at 425F for 25 min.

mealSuggestions.name: Turkey Spinach Skillet
mealSuggestions.briefInstructions: Brown turkey, add garlic and onion, wilt in spinach. Serve over rice or in tortillas.

mealSuggestions.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
mealSuggestions.briefInstructions: Hollow peppers, mix turkey with cooked rice and sauce, stuff peppers, bake with cheese on top.
